name: Spicy Mansion
description:
Experience a slice of the Spicy Boy's lives in Spicy Mansion! Visit our rooms to play our minigames and keep up with the team!

Made for Global Game Jam; the theme is "what home means to you"!

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
  • FMOD
  • Photoshop
  • Aesprite
  • Sourcetree
